H0.text: What alphabet is used in Russia. Latin

H1.text: What alphabet is used in Russia. Greek

H2.text: What alphabet is used in Russia. Arabic

H3.text: What alphabet is used in Russia. Cyrlic

A4.text: As of 2019, around 250 million people in Eurasia use Cyrillic as the official script for their national languages, with Russia accounting for about half of them.

A5.text: The Russian government has mandated that Cyrillic must be used for all public communications in all federal subjects of Russia.
